entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is being called out for. He is not visible at first but later seen to be buried in spiders.

entities.name: spiders
entities.description: Spiders are swarming and retreating under the onslaught of spells. They have Hagrid buried in their midst.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who hears someone calling his name and sprints down the front steps into the dark grounds to help Hagrid.

entities.name: giant
entities.description: A giant stands before Harry, twenty feet high, its head hidden in shadow. Its treelike, hairy shins are illuminated by the light.

relationships.description: Hagrid is buried in the midst of spiders, who are swarming and retreating under the onslaught of spells.
Harry sprints down the front steps into the dark grounds to help Hagrid, who is being attacked by spiders.
A giant stands before Harry, blocking his way and impeding his ability to chase after the spider swarm.
